answers.answer: no other indicators of a sugar problem? history of GD in your family? are you over-weight? i also thought these days if you pass the 1-hr you're fine. i'd ask him why he's sending you for the 3hr.

The nurses may have made a mistake.  Did the doctor say it would have to be a 3 hour, or was it something the nurses set up?I'd call and ask again about it.  Perhaps either it was a mistake, or there was some reason why that they didn't tell you.

I just went though this at the hospital two weeks ago.  I'm 14w, but they are freaked out cause I'm high risk so I've been under a microscope.  I did the one hour glucose test and it came back saying I had gestational diabetes.  I told them they were wrong.  The next day they took my blood sugar all day and it was normal.  Then I had the 3 hour, min four stick, glucose test...guess what- I was right and I do not have gestatinal diabetes.  With me I know they did it cause the first one came back weird.  But I have heard of them doing it several times and sometimes closer to delivery.  I know they are going to keep putting me though every test they can think of.. I think its gonna come down to a personal choice.  I know my body pretty well and I knew I just didn't have the gestational diabetes.  I'll do it again around the 25 week mark, but I'm not so sure I'll keep letting them do just to do it.

question: Hello everyone.  I just had a quick question.  I had blood work done around 16 weeks... had the one hour glucose test and all my blood work.  My doctor said everything came back great.  Ok then I went to my 22 week sono, baby looks great everything developing well.  When I went for my latest visit at 25 weeks, they said I had to go for my last set of blood work.  They said I had to fast and it would be a three hour glucose test.  Now I heard that they only do a follw up if your first glucose comes back with a sign of gestational diabetes.  But my doctor said everything was great.  So why the second test?  Anyone else going to do this also?
title: three hour blood test questions
